page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS IN CALLANDER
page.content: {ARTS,CRAFTS IN CALLANDER There is an amazing number of arts and crafts practised in this area. A local {Arts and Crafts Society }has recently been formed.This is not only to display work once a year,but to give the participants an opportunity to meet together. Four {potters }make a variety of ornaments and useful articles. Professional and amateur painters paint in a variety of styles and media. Knitting by hand and machine is undoubtedly the most popular craft.Some knitters collect wool from hedgerows,spin,then knit it. {China painting},collage,embroidery and soft toy making are enjoyed mainly by women while more men make children's toys,do wood turning and carving.{ {Theatre groups}come to the schools and there is a thriving Amateur Operatic Society.
